channel.title: Need help!
channel.description: How do I edit character rights on rscalifornia source? Whenever i edit it in notepad, this comes out. Please help. Also how would people get to my server if I created my client?

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @TrisidiaX TrisidiaX
item.description:
@TrisidiaX wrote:

hur911:

Would i have to download a new reader besides notepad?

wow this isnt a 317! lolol! ok in player.java look for “rights = 2;” Above that u should see a name some thing like “if (username.equalsIgnoreCase(”"))" just add ur name in the “” so it shuold look like “if (username.equalsIgnoreCase(“turmoil”))”
if thats ur name! ur welcome!(:

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @vV_Fant0m_Vv vV Fant0m Vv
item.description:
@vV_Fant0m_Vv wrote:

His character files are saved in a different format than Text.

On topic: If they made them save that way then they probably made a Configuration file for Character Rights. I’ve told you multiple solutions to this problem.

^^

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“heatrn11, post:2, topic:450205”][quote author=hur911 link=topic=553105.msg4052646#msg4052646 date=1342663758]
How do I edit character rights on rscalifornia source? Whenever i edit it in notepad, this comes out. Please help. Also how would people get to my server if I created my client?
[/quote]
I thought it was in the character file :S[/quote]

His character files are saved in a different format than Text.

On topic: If they made them save that way then they probably made a Configuration file for Character Rights. I’ve told you multiple solutions to this problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @hur911 hur911
item.description:

Yea that is what i thought but the what i am used to is not there. i used control f and i couldnt even find the word character.
